name: christine nunez
text: Excited to see business open and came with my siblings to support (party of 5). What I didn't except was to be greeted by a gentlemen with a beard (Jaime the manager) and his crunchy attitude. The mood in there was very uncomfortable with â€¦More

name: V M
text: Staff is terrible!! They should be let go tbh, Blaze pizza is a very reputable pizza place but the staff is the worst.

name: Lisa D
text: Love this place! Pizza is my favorite food and the pizza here is one of my top choices! The crust was so yummy and we made and the toppings were fresh. I recommend Blaze pizza for sure!

name: Tim Bro
text: I consider myself a pizza savant, and maybe that was my first mistake in thinking I could get decent pizza at a fast food restaurant. â€¦More

name: Kent Ma
text: Got to do build your own pizza at this place.  All the toppings you want for the same price.

name: hank vincent
text:
The service was not the best. Fair. Immature employees with no sense of serving.
Pizza was fine.

text: Excited to see business open and came with my siblings to support (party of 5). What I didn't except was to be greeted by a gentlemen with a beard (Jaime the manager) and his crunchy attitude. The mood in there was very uncomfortable with â€¦More

name: Amber Steeves
text: I'm not a huge fan of pizza but I'm submitting the rating based on everyone around me. I've ordered and picked up from this restaurant several times They have a great online ordering system that can save you a lot of waiting. The pizza is â€¦More

name: Paul Huntzinger
text: Pretty tasty and a reasonable price

name: Michael Serrano
text: LOVE Blaze Pizza! Always fresh and always tasty. Some locations (Campus Dr) tend to get sloppy when they get busy (burned crust, grumpy staff, poor pizza assembly) but this one in Fashion Island is always great. Does get busy during weekdays lunch hours but the staff is always friendly.

name: Huck Agar-Johnson
text: This pizza is excellent! The crust is very thin and incredibly crispy. The sauce and cheese is very nice as well. This is a place where you can completely customize your pizza how you would like. The service is fast and the food is very â€¦More

name: Deepest Feels
text: Customer service is okay , produce is pretty fresh

name: Gustavo Melchor
text: Really good service and always fresh

name: Ben Shaw
text: Only been here once and it was a good experience. Everyone working seemed to be in high school, but they were all pretty good workers, considering. The experience was kind of unique, because you build your own pizza or you can go with â€¦More

name: Abdul Shariq
text: Always the best, gluten free fresh base is amazing and stafff is cool... some time some new joinee cribs but can be ignored

name: Noah Paez
text: Good pizza, nice music, clean restaurant, good pricing and nice outdoor seating

name: Daniel Fairbourn
text: High quality food chain! Well priced, and so many options. Can satisfy anybody. The make your own option is fantastic.

name: San Daniel
text: OMg todayâ€™s pizza made my day, the girl make it so high rise with lots of ingredients. oh and the heated Sâ€™morse was outstanding. Thank you guys so much!! A1

name: David Shaddock
text: I loved being able to create whatever pizza I wanted, and it came out of the oven ten minutes later.  The crust was great!  Well, it leaves black ash on your fingers so don't wear white and take two napkins....

name: Alla Maximov
text: Tertible service, not helpful, not caring. The food is good though, however quite over priced- $5 for a tiny salad and $15 for individual pizza. This was our first time, employees did not help with orientation whatsoever

name: taras bohonok
text: Love this place. Great ingredients and they make each pie with fresh dough

name: Michael Wise
text: Decent fast food thin crust pie

name: RaeAnn Clark
text: Zander is an amazing employee. Quick, polite and knowledgeable. Great service

name: Vic Gajek
text: Blaze pizza was very good.Great thin crust, you can not beat the value.Looking to return soon.

name: J Jesus
text: the manager was SO RUDE, I eat out 3 to 5 times out every week due to my work, let me tell you I have never seen such a rude manager and a working staff which was surprising to me because of the location of the store and how it was a more â€¦More

name: Brandon McCartney
text: Pizza here is awesome. Best take-away pizza around for the price ($8). Would give 5stars, but -1 for the location being deep in the mall. That said, def worth the short walk from the parking lot.

name: Christina Fail
text: Usually quick and efficient. That day was totally slammed and they fell apart. Would've been a 5 if they had handled it better

name: Michael Huntley
text: Easy to use especially with the Blaze app. Skipped the line and were in and out quickly.

name: Nils Quinta
text: Fantastic custom pizzas, delivered by doordash

name: Nicole Phan
text: I had a bad experience here with wait time before, but was promptly contacted by the store manager.  Since then, it's gotten better.  The UCI one I'd say is most efficient but the parking lot over there is too cramped.

name: Christian Montague
text: Oh my gosh, this is the best pizza I have ever had, hands down. All fresh ingredients, super convenient and quick. The staff us great, except the manager he is kind of a jerk.

name: Ron A.
text: I have been here for lunch a few times now. Once for dinner. It is not too busy at all during lunch hour. The service is great and the pizzas are cooked to perfection, in my opinion. I like it crispy a little bit. They use fire, not an â€¦More

name: Maria T
text: Their service was terrible. I was first in line and waited 10 minutes for them to finally get the dough ready and toppings. (Not for it to cook for them to take my order and there was to line for the order taking) with the bad service present, the pizza was actually good. I would rate it 0 stars but the pizza tasted good.

name: Rosalina Hernandez
text: Great as always, especially when you build your own pizza.

name: Neil H
text: Great pizza. Good service. Low salt.

name: Maria Persson
text: Good value for money. Building your own pizza is great and they are very tasty.

name: Joe Phillips
text: Our family really enjoys the blaze pizza franchise. Kids love to watch the pizza's being prepared and then shipped off to the oven. The pizza's are delicious and the wait is minimal..

name: zoe cohen
text: Very good pizza,  kid friendly,  great service

name: Dheeraj Nataraj

name: joe fahim
text:
very bad service, Jaime was arguing with employee in front of the customer
and then started arguing with me the customer, very rude service ask me to leave the place .  will never go any blaze pizza again

name: Art P
text: Tasty pizza made the way I like.

name: John Lee
text: Pizza was great but this location like to chat with the customers a lot, so be prepared to wait in line a little longer than usual.

name: Manoj Baghel
text: Veg pizza was good but not so good

name: John Sellers
text: I Have a gluten allergy and they have gluten free dough and were very careful to use fresh gloves and utensils when handling and preparing food.  I really appreciate being able to go out for pizza again..... And it was good. The staff was very friendly and courteous.

name: Meme Nisimo
text: Blaze is great for getting fast pizza any way you want it.  Delicious sauces and gourmet toppings in unlimited quantities...you say when.  Pizza is enough for two people to share, but at those prices, you can get one each.  The drinks are unique (lemonade and others) and worth a try.

name: Ray Rothrock
text: I love Blaze Pizza, they use great quality ingredients and are reasonably priced. But I was alarmed at how poorly run this branch was (at least when I visited at about 2 p.m. today). They claimed they were all out of their garlic pesto â€¦More

name: itssmrschavez _24
text: Love it! Love it! Love it! Specially when the pizza crust is crispyðŸ˜‹

name: Dan Cusato
text: Nice quality well prepared made for a tasty pie. Staff, well let's just say they didn't seem to be happy campers.

name: Nasser Al-Medlej
text: Needs to be more and intrduce many vrities

name: Grey Atwood
text: Amazing and quick. Pick what you want! Bottled drinks or a fountain is avail with coke products. And juices. Less than 5 min wait after ordering.  Has a bathroom. Upstairs above American rag. Lots of seating.

name: Devi San Martin
text: The quality of the food is the same in any blaze pizza. I've been in several but in this one I didn't see any girl working. May be that's the reason the tables were dirt, restroom run out of paper towel as well toilet paper

name: Dejan Nenov
text: Good day service. Not particularly memorable taste.

name: Alma Reynoso
text: The employees appeared to hate their jobs. The guy making my pizza was not very pleasant. I asked for sausage he said they were out... Another guy asked if they had sausage and the girl helping him said yes and went to get it.  My pizza was almost charred on the bottom.  Poor slow service

name: Matthew Hayashibara
text: Good, inexpensive food... Fast! What's not to like?

text: Whenever i crave pizza and Iâ€™m in my work area i go to blaze pizza. Yesterday was Pi day so a while pizza is $3.14. Awesome deal!

text: Amazing Pizza! The place here is Awesome! Build your own Pizza.  Friendly service, wonderful environment, and fast cooking Pizza! 180 seconds!!!

text: If I could give this pathetic place negativity stars I would our server who was making our pizza was not only chewing gum with his mouth open but also forgot to make our second pizza.  I left immediately knowing that I will not waste my â€¦More

text: I like Blaze for quality and flavor.  Good location here and fast service.

text: Favorite local pizza shop. The doughnuts are a must!

name: Rob Briceno
text: Tasty pizza cold beer !

name: Shane Hunter
text: Blaze pizza in fashion island accepted and apparently prepared a meal I ordered on Postmates. I then got a call from my delivery driver saying the restaurant is closed and my food was not available. Not the thing I needed to deal with tonight. Bad form Blaze!

name: Kendle Hanson
text: Best customized pizza ever! Thin crust, I like garlic pesto base (instead of tomatoe sauce), lots of choices of meats & veggies! Build your item pizza under $10.

name: Bridget Burrell
text: Slow, slow, slow, slow! Employees disappear in back. Iâ€™ve been here twice the place is dead and they are super painfully slow. Iâ€™ve been to other Blazes and it is like the hair and the tortoise when comparing.

name: Caren Millan
text: Fisrt time coming here and I loved it. You get to build your own pizza, no extra charge for extra toppings. Can't get any better than that.

name: Craig Fullman
text: Quick pizza, thin crust, lots of choices for pizza but only 3 salads.  This was my 2nd visit to Blaze.

name: Greg Lawson
text: Delicious and fast thin crust pizza. Very clean and well run with courteous staff. Go build one and see.

name: Connie Kissam
text: I love being able to get my pizza, hot and fresh in 5 minutes. The food servers are always friendly. Can't get enough of this place.

text: The interesting difference between this location and others in Orange County is a window into the dough room. After the crust has proofed, employees scrape the side of the container, flip the dough onto the counter surface, perfectly â€¦More

text: Awesome pizza and fast service

name: Brian Belot
text: Any toppings for $8. And delicious. Great lunch spot with co-workers.

name: Anita Carr
text: Our favourite pizza place in Newport Beach!
